snippet.title: Football icon Les Murray dies aged 71
snippet.content:
Les Murray was a football icon.
Share
AUSTRALIAN football icon Les Murray has died aged 71. The legendary commentator and broadcaster was for so long the face of football in this country as a fixture on SBS. CEO and managing director of SBS Michael Ebeid was quick to pay tribute to his "dear friend". Devastated at the news that our dear friend & colleague Les Murray has passed away. A great Australian who really has left a great legacy. More to come ...
